name: unmatchable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
of very high quality and therefore impossible to copy: The orchestra excelled at this time and were playing at a level that seemed unmatchable. The sequels have all been successful and were well-made films but couldn't really compare with the unmatchable original.
More examplesFewer examplesThe explorers' journey is an unmatchable story of bravery and resilience under the harshest of conditions.I was always taken aback by her unmatchable displays of generosity.His knowledge of the ins and outs of the political system is unmatchable.
